org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class GenesFileProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.GenesFileProcessor

  • public class GenesFileProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    CLASS NOT IN USE SINCE IM 1.1 Processor of file with information about genes. Format of file: tax_id GeneID Symbol LocusTag Synonyms dbXrefs chromosome map_location description type_of_gene Symbol_from_nomenclature_authority Full_name_from_nomenclature_authority Nomenclature_status Other_designations Modification_date (tab is used as a separator, pound sign - start of a comment)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenesFileProcessor

        public GenesFileProcessor(java.io.Reader fileReader,
                  DataConverter converter,
                  java.lang.String datasetRefId,
                  IdResolver rslv)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        fileReader - file reader, this class is not responsible for closing fileReader
        converter - associated converter that is used for creating and saving items
        datasetRefId - reference to dataset object for the gene
        resolverFactory - the FlyBase id resolver factory

    • Method Detail

      • processGenes

        public void processGenes(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> geneToPub,
                java.lang.Integer orgToProcessId,
                java.lang.String organismRefId,
                java.util.Set<java.lang.String> taxonIds)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        geneToPub - map between gene and list of publication that mentions this gene
        orgToProcessId - taxonID for organism of this gene
        organismRefId - ID representing the organism object
        taxonIds - list of taxons from config file, if empty all processed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when error happens during reading from file
